channel.title: Clients on TURB.CO
channel.description: Recent content in Clients on TURB.CO

item.title: Sommelier
item.description: Primary protocol engineer on the Ethereum/Sommelier bridge, to transfer assets between Sommelier L1 and EVM based platforms. Sommelier

item.title: IQT
item.description: Designed and developed a PostgresQL backed GraphQL endpoint with custom Go middlewares to allow front end teams to rapidly iterate on changing backend data. Integrated with Salesforce. IQT

item.title: 2U
item.description: Designed and developed a custom Content Management System to allow for templated creation, design and deployment of white label client landing/call-to-action pages. 2U
